alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 09 at 2:17AM MDT until May 09 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Quay County, Eastern San Miguel County and Harding County. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust will be possible with reduced visibility down to 2 to 5 miles in some locations.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Quay County
